text: Juan Carlos Dante Gullo (8 June 1947 âˆ’ 3 May 2019) was an Argentine sociologist and politician. He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 2007 to 2011. He was also a member the Buenos Aires City Legislature from 2011 to 2015. He was born in Buenos Aires. Gullo died on 3 May 2019, at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:South American sociologists
title: Dante Gullo
